text.0: The American Medical Association has adopted a new policy aimed at preventing and combating #racism in health care practices and policies. Proclaiming racism an "urgent threat to public health," the group announced the new policy on Monday.

text.2: This video demonstrates percutaneous tracheostomy, a procedure that may be performed at the patient’s bedside, including patients with #COVID19, who may require a tracheostomy during severe respiratory distress. #SARSCoV2
text.3: In the past few months, as I’ve learned to catch and care for babies, select elegant antibiotics, and titrate methadone, I’ve also learned that bearing witness to my patients’ isolation and its repercussions is now part of my job, too.
